name: Happy to See Me with Erika Casupanan

episodes.title: 73. Katurah Topps on surviving a cult and seeking joy after reality TV
episodes.description:
Katurah Topps @katurahtopps  (Survivor 45) opens up about growing up in a cult and the complexities of sharing such a personal story with millions of people. Erika and Katurah discuss the realities of playing Survivor while being underestimated. Plus, Katurah chats about taking a break from traditional law practice, writing a memoir and life post-Survivor. Tune in for a fun chat about resilience, identity and the power of storytelling.

Follow Katurah on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/hautekatur/
Follow the podcast on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/happytoseemepod/ 
Follow Erika on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/erika_cas/ 

Please rate, review and subscribe! 

Host, creator and executive producer: Erika Casupanan 
Brand strategy by Natalie Cunningham 
Music by Dylan Mackenzie 
Podcast visual design by Amanda McCusker 
Photography by Clarence Creates
